vendor_name: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
title: Vietnam Waterfront Oasis: KOI Resort & Spa Hoi An
description: Relax and indulge with a serene waterfront escape in Vietnam’s Hoi An - with dinners and cocktails included - close to the white sands of Cua Dai beach and just ten minutes from the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Hoi An Old Town. Enjoy six nights at KOI Resort & Spa Hoi An with return private airport transfers, daily buffet breakfasts, your choice of daily lunch or dinner, a nightly cocktail each, a Vietnamese cooking class and a massage each for two adults.
location_description: KOI Resort & Spa Hoi An  - Dec 2017
offer_address: Cua Dai Beach, Au Co Street, City, Tp. Hội An, Quảng Nam, Vietnam

title: Nam Nghi: Experience Stunning Phu Quoc Island with VIP Dining
description: The pinnacle of oceanfront tranquillity awaits at Nam Nghi Phu Quoc Island, a one-hour flight from Ho Chi Minh City in Vietnam. Stay in a Blue Ocean Deluxe room and enjoy an airport pick-up, daily buffet breakfasts, daily three-course lunches or dinners, daily cocktails, a cooking class and three 60-minute massages to share.
location_description: Nam Nghi Phu Quoc Island - OLD
offer_address: Hamlet 4 , Cua Can Commune, Phu Quoc, Kiên Giang 920000, Vietnam
